verses.text: \w Belshazzar|strong="H1113"\w* \w the|strong="H5648"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w made|strong="H5648"\w* \w a|strong="H5648"\w* \w great|strong="H7229"\w* \w feast|strong="H3900"\w* \w for|strong="H6903"\w* \w a|strong="H5648"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0506"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* his lords, \w drinking|strong="H8355"\w* \w wine|strong="H2562"\w* \w before|strong="H6903"\w* \w the|strong="H5648"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0506"\w*.

\w Belshazzar|strong="H1113"\w*, while \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w was|strong="H4430"\w* overcome with \w wine|strong="H2562"\w*, \w gave|strong="H0560"\w* \w orders|strong="H0560"\w* \w for|strong="H1768"\w* \w them|strong="H0560"\w* \w to|strong="H0560"\w* put before \w him|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w gold|strong="H1722"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w silver|strong="H3702"\w* \w vessels|strong="H3984"\w* \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w*, \w his|strong="H5020"\w* \w father|strong="H0002"\w*, \w had|strong="H4430"\w* \w taken|strong="H5312"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w Temple|strong="H1965"\w* \w in|strong="H1965"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*; \w so|strong="H1768"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w his|strong="H5020"\w* lords, \w his|strong="H5020"\w* \w wives|strong="H7695"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w his|strong="H5020"\w* other women, \w might|strong="H3904"\w* take their \w drink|strong="H8355"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w them|strong="H0560"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w they|strong="H0116"\w* \w took|strong="H5312"\w* \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w gold|strong="H1722"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* silver \w vessels|strong="H3984"\w* \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w had|strong="H4430"\w* been \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w Temple|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w* \w at|strong="H0426"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*; \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w his|strong="H1768"\w* lords, \w his|strong="H1768"\w* \w wives|strong="H7695"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w his|strong="H1768"\w* other women, \w took|strong="H5312"\w* wine \w from|strong="H4481"\w* them.

They took their \w wine|strong="H2562"\w* \w and|strong="H6523"\w* gave \w praise|strong="H7624"\w* to \w the|strong="H7624"\w* \w gods|strong="H0426"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w gold|strong="H1722"\w* \w and|strong="H6523"\w* \w silver|strong="H3702"\w*, \w of|strong="H0426"\w* brass \w and|strong="H6523"\w* \w iron|strong="H6523"\w* \w and|strong="H6523"\w* \w wood|strong="H0636"\w* \w and|strong="H6523"\w* \w stone|strong="H0069"\w*.

\w In|strong="H1965"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* very hour \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w fingers|strong="H0677"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w a|strong="H2370"\w* man's \w hand|strong="H3028"\w* \w were|strong="H1768"\w* \w seen|strong="H2370"\w*, \w writing|strong="H3790"\w* \w opposite|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* support \w for|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* light \w on|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* white \w wall|strong="H3797"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* king's house, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w saw|strong="H2370"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* part \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w hand|strong="H3028"\w* \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w was|strong="H4430"\w* \w writing|strong="H3790"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* colour \w went|strong="H8271"\w* \w from|strong="H8133"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* king's \w face|strong="H2122"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w he|strong="H0116"\w* \w was|strong="H4430"\w* \w troubled|strong="H0927"\w* by his \w thoughts|strong="H7476"\w*; strength \w went|strong="H8271"\w* \w from|strong="H8133"\w* his body, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* his knees \w were|strong="H2122"\w* shaking.

\w The|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, crying \w out|strong="H1505"\w* \w with|strong="H3848"\w* \w a|strong="H6032"\w* loud voice, \w said|strong="H0560"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* users \w of|strong="H4437"\w* secret arts, \w the|strong="H3606"\w* Chaldaeans, \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* readers \w of|strong="H4437"\w* signs, \w were|strong="H1768"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* be sent \w for|strong="H1768"\w*. \w The|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w made|strong="H7981"\w* answer \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w said|strong="H0560"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w wise|strong="H2445"\w* \w men|strong="H2445"\w* \w of|strong="H4437"\w* \w Babylon|strong="H0895"\w*, Whoever \w is|strong="H1768"\w* able \w to|strong="H5922"\w* make \w out|strong="H1505"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w writing|strong="H3792"\w*, \w and|strong="H6032"\w* make clear \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w me|strong="H5954"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* sense \w of|strong="H4437"\w* \w it|strong="H5922"\w*, \w will|strong="H1768"\w* be \w clothed|strong="H3848"\w* \w in|strong="H5954"\w* \w purple|strong="H0711"\w* \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w have|strong="H7981"\w* \w a|strong="H6032"\w* chain \w of|strong="H4437"\w* \w gold|strong="H1722"\w* round \w his|strong="H5922"\w* \w neck|strong="H6676"\w*, \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w will|strong="H1768"\w* be \w a|strong="H6032"\w* \w ruler|strong="H7981"\w* \w of|strong="H4437"\w* high \w authority|strong="H7981"\w* \w in|strong="H5954"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* king's \w wise|strong="H2445"\w* \w men|strong="H2445"\w* \w came|strong="H5954"\w* \w in|strong="H5954"\w*: \w but|strong="H0116"\w* \w they|strong="H0116"\w* were \w not|strong="H3809"\w* \w able|strong="H3546"\w* \w to|strong="H3546"\w* \w make|strong="H3046"\w* out \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w writing|strong="H3792"\w* \w or|strong="H3809"\w* give \w the|strong="H3606"\w* sense \w of|strong="H4430"\w* it \w to|strong="H3546"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w King|strong="H4430"\w* \w Belshazzar|strong="H1113"\w* \w was|strong="H4430"\w* \w greatly|strong="H7690"\w* \w troubled|strong="H0927"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* colour went \w from|strong="H8133"\w* \w his|strong="H5922"\w* \w face|strong="H2122"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w his|strong="H5922"\w* lords \w were|strong="H2122"\w* at \w a|strong="H0116"\w* loss.

\w The|strong="H0560"\w* \w queen|strong="H4433"\w*, \w because|strong="H6903"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* \w the|strong="H0560"\w* \w words|strong="H4406"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* \w the|strong="H0560"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w his|strong="H5954"\w* lords, \w came|strong="H5954"\w* \w into|strong="H5954"\w* \w the|strong="H0560"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* \w the|strong="H0560"\w* feast: \w the|strong="H0560"\w* \w queen|strong="H4433"\w* made answer \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w said|strong="H0560"\w*, O \w King|strong="H4430"\w*, \w have|strong="H4430"\w* life \w for|strong="H6903"\w* \w ever|strong="H5957"\w*; do not \w be|strong="H2122"\w* \w troubled|strong="H0927"\w* by your \w thoughts|strong="H7476"\w* \w or|strong="H4430"\w* let \w the|strong="H0560"\w* colour go \w from|strong="H8133"\w* your \w face|strong="H2122"\w*:

\w There|strong="H0383"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w a|strong="H7912"\w* \w man|strong="H1400"\w* \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w your|strong="H5020"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w* \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w whom|strong="H1768"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7308"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w holy|strong="H6922"\w* \w gods|strong="H0426"\w*; \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w days|strong="H3118"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w your|strong="H5020"\w* \w father|strong="H0002"\w*, light \w and|strong="H4430"\w* reason like \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2452"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w gods|strong="H0426"\w* \w were|strong="H1400"\w* seen \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w him|strong="H6966"\w*: \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w King|strong="H4430"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w*, \w your|strong="H5020"\w* \w father|strong="H0002"\w*, \w made|strong="H6966"\w* \w him|strong="H6966"\w* master \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* wonder-workers, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* users \w of|strong="H0426"\w* secret arts, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* Chaldaeans, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* readers \w of|strong="H0426"\w* signs;

\w Because|strong="H6903"\w* \w a|strong="H7761"\w* most special \w spirit|strong="H7308"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H4486"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w reason|strong="H4486"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* power \w of|strong="H4430"\w* reading \w dreams|strong="H2493"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* unfolding dark sayings \w and|strong="H4430"\w* answering hard questions, \w were|strong="H1768"\w* seen \w to|strong="H8271"\w* \w be|strong="H3705"\w* \w in|strong="H4430"\w* him, \w even|strong="H1768"\w* \w in|strong="H4430"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* (\w named|strong="H8036"\w* \w Belteshazzar|strong="H1096"\w* \w by|strong="H7761"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*): \w now|strong="H3705"\w* \w let|strong="H3705"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w be|strong="H3705"\w* sent \w for|strong="H1768"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w will|strong="H1768"\w* \w make|strong="H7761"\w* clear \w the|strong="H3606"\w* sense \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* writing.

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w they|strong="H0116"\w* took \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w in|strong="H5954"\w* \w before|strong="H6925"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*; \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* made answer \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w said|strong="H0560"\w* \w to|strong="H0560"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w*, \w So|strong="H0116"\w* \w you|strong="H0607"\w* \w are|strong="H1768"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w*, \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* prisoners \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3061"\w*, \w whom|strong="H1768"\w* \w my|strong="H1768"\w* \w father|strong="H0002"\w* took out \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3061"\w*.

\w And|strong="H2452"\w* \w I|strong="H1768"\w* have \w had|strong="H1768"\w* news \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w*, \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7308"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w gods|strong="H0426"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w*, \w and|strong="H2452"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* light \w and|strong="H2452"\w* reason \w and|strong="H2452"\w* special \w wisdom|strong="H2452"\w* have been seen \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3792"\w* \w now|strong="H3705"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w wise|strong="H2445"\w* \w men|strong="H2445"\w*, \w the|strong="H1768"\w* users \w of|strong="H2445"\w* \w secret|strong="H4406"\w* arts, have been sent \w in|strong="H5954"\w* \w before|strong="H6925"\w* \w me|strong="H6925"\w* \w for|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* purpose \w of|strong="H2445"\w* reading \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w writing|strong="H3792"\w* \w and|strong="H3792"\w* \w making|strong="H3046"\w* clear \w to|strong="H6925"\w* \w me|strong="H6925"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* sense \w of|strong="H2445"\w* it: \w but|strong="H1768"\w* \w they|strong="H1768"\w* \w are|strong="H1768"\w* \w not|strong="H3809"\w* \w able|strong="H3546"\w* \w to|strong="H6925"\w* \w make|strong="H3046"\w* clear \w the|strong="H1768"\w* sense \w of|strong="H2445"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w thing|strong="H4406"\w*:

\w And|strong="H1722"\w* \w I|strong="H0576"\w* \w have|strong="H0576"\w* \w had|strong="H1768"\w* news \w of|strong="H4437"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w*, \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w* \w have|strong="H0576"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* power \w of|strong="H4437"\w* \w making|strong="H3046"\w* things clear, \w and|strong="H1722"\w* \w of|strong="H4437"\w* answering hard questions: \w now|strong="H3705"\w* \w if|strong="H2006"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w* \w are|strong="H1768"\w* \w able|strong="H3202"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w make|strong="H3046"\w* out \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w writing|strong="H3792"\w* \w and|strong="H1722"\w* \w give|strong="H6590"\w* me \w the|strong="H5922"\w* sense \w of|strong="H4437"\w* \w it|strong="H2006"\w*, \w you|strong="H1768"\w* \w will|strong="H1768"\w* \w be|strong="H3705"\w* \w clothed|strong="H3848"\w* \w in|strong="H4437"\w* \w purple|strong="H0711"\w* \w and|strong="H1722"\w* \w have|strong="H0576"\w* a \w gold|strong="H1722"\w* chain round \w your|strong="H5922"\w* \w neck|strong="H6676"\w* \w and|strong="H1722"\w* \w be|strong="H3705"\w* a \w ruler|strong="H7981"\w* \w of|strong="H4437"\w* high \w authority|strong="H7981"\w* \w in|strong="H4437"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w made|strong="H3046"\w* answer \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w said|strong="H0560"\w* \w to|strong="H0560"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, Keep \w your|strong="H3052"\w* offerings \w for|strong="H3046"\w* yourself, \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w give|strong="H3052"\w* \w your|strong="H3052"\w* \w rewards|strong="H5023"\w* \w to|strong="H0560"\w* \w another|strong="H0321"\w*; \w but|strong="H1297"\w* \w I|strong="H0116"\w*, after reading \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w writing|strong="H3792"\w* \w to|strong="H0560"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w will|strong="H4430"\w* \w give|strong="H3052"\w* \w him|strong="H3052"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* sense \w of|strong="H4430"\w* it.

\w As|strong="H4437"\w* for \w you|strong="H0607"\w*, O \w King|strong="H4430"\w*, \w the|strong="H5020"\w* \w Most|strong="H5943"\w* \w High|strong="H5943"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w* \w gave|strong="H3052"\w* \w to|strong="H3052"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w*, \w your|strong="H3052"\w* \w father|strong="H0002"\w*, \w the|strong="H5020"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* great power \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w glory|strong="H3367"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* honour:

\w And|strong="H0524"\w* \w because|strong="H4481"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* great power \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w gave|strong="H3052"\w* \w him|strong="H3052"\w*, \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w peoples|strong="H5972"\w* \w and|strong="H0524"\w* \w nations|strong="H0524"\w* \w and|strong="H0524"\w* languages \w were|strong="H1934"\w* shaking \w in|strong="H1768"\w* \w fear|strong="H1763"\w* \w before|strong="H6925"\w* \w him|strong="H3052"\w*: \w some|strong="H4481"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* put \w to|strong="H6925"\w* death \w and|strong="H0524"\w* others \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w kept|strong="H1934"\w* living, at \w his|strong="H6925"\w* pleasure, lifting \w up|strong="H6925"\w* \w some|strong="H4481"\w* \w and|strong="H0524"\w* putting others down \w as|strong="H1768"\w* it pleased \w him|strong="H3052"\w*.
